desc: Features: Gain up to 50hp, Improved torque, Increase fuel economy, Increase reliability, less downtime, Quick turn around time, No losing power going up small hills, emissions converted from active to Passive system, emissions system still operate with less downtimes of de-rates, less maintaince shutdowns, truck tuning

layout.text: Call for a free consultation to discuss your situation and options.
Save money by reducing downtime and costly repairs. Not the Standard "Delete Kits" offered by other companies, our sophisticated method makes the old labor intensive solutions obsolete.
